## ProgramBuilder.textureArrayLoad() method

Same as texelFetch builtin function in GLSL and textureLoad builtin function in WGSL, only valid for WebGL2 and WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
textureArrayLoad(tex: PBShaderExp, coords: number | PBShaderExp, arrayIndex: number | PBShaderExp, level: number | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tex | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  coords | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  arrayIndex | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  level | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
